about-me.name: I'm Ahmed Mohamed
about-me.title: Fullstack web engineer | UI/UX Designer
about-me.my-start: In 2018, I took the plunge into the world of custom Discord bots, immersing myself in the intricate realm of coding and web development. As time marched on, I found myself fortunate to craft software for a diverse array of clients.
about-me.my-foucs: Currently, my primary focus revolves around crafting products for clients at Mostaql. During my free time, I delve into exploring new concepts, trends, and emerging technologies.
about-me.my-life: When I’m not at the computer, you'll often find me immersed in music, socializing with friends, or indulging in some anime watching. It's a refreshing break from the digital world.

project.description: I prioritize client privacy and only showcase projects with their explicit approval

blog.description: This blog serves as a repository for my writings, covering a spectrum from professional insights to personal anecdotes and anything in between
blog.rt: {count, plural, =0 {# minutes} =1 {one minute} other {# minutes}} read

locale-alert.title: Localization Available!
locale-alert.description: You're currently viewing a blog in a language different from your selected locale. Fortunately, there's a localized version available for your locale.

locale-not-found-alert.title: Localization Unavailable!
locale-not-found-alert.description: You're currently viewing a blog in a language different from your selected locale. Unfortunately, there's no localization available for your locale at the moment. I will update it as soon as possible.
